raw akas.title: Cyrus Ryson The Great Ruins Of Truth & The Times Of Revelation

akas: Cyrus Ryson The Great Ruins Of Truth & The Times Of Revelation (original title)
akas from release info: Cyrus Ryson The Great Ruins Of Truth & The Times Of Revelation (original title)

1.title: A Dark End Approaches

episode of.title: Cyrus Ryson The Great Ruins Of Truth & The Times Of Revelation (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Cyrus is doubting whether he is the one to see the event through. The serpent mocks and torments him, trying to cause Cyrus to give up, but instead only makes him want to see the even through even more. Darkness has arrived and Cyrus must battle to stop the Immortals plans and free his son of the Immortal being.

2.title: Battle Against Time

episode of.title: Cyrus Ryson The Great Ruins Of Truth & The Times Of Revelation (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: It's a race and battle against time to stop the immortal being from creating a link between river cray and the nexus zone. From opening gateways to the nexus. Cyrus must do all he can to prevent the Immortal being from completing the opening process that was started a year prior.

3.title: The Link Between & The Evil From Within

episode of.title: Cyrus Ryson The Great Ruins Of Truth & The Times Of Revelation (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: The Link between the nexus and river cray is formed and the gateways are open. The long process is complete and now things go from bad to worse. Not only does Cyrus have another problem to deal with that has arrived from one of the gateways, but he also must fight to help Michael gain complete control back of his own body.

imdb.plot outline: Carnations Ministry and Carnexus Universe presents an original movie series by Cyrus R Thompson. Cyrus Ryson - The Great Ruins Of Truth and The Times Of Revelation. The series is part of the Cyrus Ryson franchise which will consist of both upcoming books and series and or movies.. The series has three episodes coming out in summer and then it will return with another two or three in the winter before finishing with the remaining episodes sometime in 2019.
imdb.title: Cyrus Ryson The Great Ruins Of Truth & The Times Of Revelation
plot: Carnations Ministry and Carnexus Universe presents a Cyrus R Thompson Original Series based on the Cyrus Ryson franchise which consists of five stories. This series is based on the third story of that franchise.::Cyrus R Thompson

Carnations Ministry and Carnexus Universe presents an original movie series by Cyrus R Thompson. Cyrus Ryson - The Great Ruins Of Truth and The Times Of Revelation. The series is part of the Cyrus Ryson franchise which will consist of both upcoming books and series and or movies.. The series has three episodes coming out in summer and then it will return with another two or three in the winter before finishing with the remaining episodes sometime in 2019.::Cyrus R Thompson
